Wait for screen on conductor machine to show \'Pass Renewed\' Don\'t worry! Sometimes the confirmation process can take a while. We shall notify you once the recharge is completed. Click RETRY when the conductor is near you. Please \"forget\" the savedwifi network from your wifi settings. Oops! Token just got dropped. Worry not, get a new one. No money gets deducted when you request a new token. Sorry! We are unable to get your ticket. Please retry. A token can drop sometimes. No money is deducted when you RETRY. Your request has been rejected by conductor. Check trip details and retry. Please check with the conductor and retry accordingly. It\'s a rare scenario. Retrying should solve the issue. Don\'t press the back button otherwise your ticket will get cancelled. Please do not change any wifi setting till you get your ticket. Please turn Off the \"Smart Network Switch\" option. You can turn it off in your Wi-Fi Setting.\n\nClick on \"More\" when you are in Wi-Fi Setting to access \"Smart Network Switch\". Please turn Off the "Smart Network Switch " option.\n\nUncheck the option when you are in Wi-fi Setting. Enter your 14 digit BEST Bus Pass no in the field provided Ridlr doesn’t support Student, Blind Citizen and Child type Passes. Ridlr doesn’t support distance-wise passes for more than one routes. You can renew your Pass through Ridlr 7 days before your validity expires. For example, if your Pass validity expires on 31st January, then you can renew your Pass only after 24th January. Post renewing your pass, please get it validated by the conductor next day, but within 4 days, else you have to visit your nearby depot to do it. A receipt will be mailed to you on every successful renewal. You can also view your receipt in the transaction history in Ridlr. For further assistance, you can call us on our helpline at 18001213233 (8 am – 9 pm, Mon – Sat) or email us at support@ridlr.in. Enter your 14 digit BEST Daily Pass Number (if you have one). Once we get your pass information, you can buy a Daily Pass on the mobile. If you do not have a Daily Pass, click on “REGISTER NOW” to register a new Daily Pass. Ridlr supports 4 types of passes: City Non AC, Suburban Non AC, Magic Non AC (all Non AC buses) and Magic AC (All buses). Once you buy a Daily pass, you will have to validate it with the conductor on every journey. To validate, click on the “VALIDATE” button, get a token and tell the conductor your token No paper ticket will be printed the your Daily Pass is validated If you have bought a Daily Pass but your mobile is switched off, you will have to buy a ticket on the bus. Note: The Daily Pass can only be used on this phone and cannot be switched to another phone For further assistance, you can call us on our helpline at 18001213233 (8am - 9pm, Mon -Sat) or email us at support@ridlr.in Mobile Pass registration and renewal enables you to travel on the selected routes without the need of an RFID pass To register, you will have to add your photo (using the front facing camera of your phone), enter your name, date of birth and gender After registering, you will have to purchase the mobile pass you need for your travel Ridlr supports: Distance Wise and Fixed Amount type passes Ridlr does not support Student, Blind, Senior Citizen and Children passes You can renew your Mobile Pass and start traveling the same day. Note: The Mobile Pass can only be used on this phone and cannot be switched to another phone Once a Mobile Pass is bought, BEST or Ridlr will not refund the money Once you buy a Mobile pass, you will have to validate it with the conductor on every journey. To validate, click on the “VALIDATE” button, get a token and tell the conductor your token No paper ticket will be printed the when your Mobile Pass is validated If you have bought a Mobile Pass but your mobile is switched off, you will have to buy a ticket on the bus. For further assistance, you can call us on our helpline at 18001213233 (8am - 9pm, Mon -Sat) or email us at support@ridlr.in Recents tickets ticket How to use token Select Your Bus and Continue Manual verification steps for conductor http://ridlr.in/passvalidation Seems like there are multiple buses with same bus number nearby. Your ticket should have the same source and destination as supported by your pass. Cancel or Refunds Please send us the ticket picture. KNOW MORE How To Claim Refund Buy a paper Ticket and claim your refund from Support center Step 1 Buy the paper ticket for the same route as per your pass Step 2 Visit support center and upload your paper ticket. Step 3 Receive ticket amount in Ridlr points within 72 hours. Get Early Access Now your mobile will be your Metro travel companion. We\'re giving early access to 200 lucky users to try out our features. No more standing in queues No physical tokens and cards No cash payments Yes, count me in!
